Sorry for a delayed response, no at this time `hs watch` does not work with `filemanager` .That said `watch` is mostly used for active development, itâ€™s less likely you would need that kind of uploading. Especially given that the Design manager supports uploading a lot of different assets like many image formats.

If you have say an image optimization script going, and you want your images stored in the file manager vs the design manager, I would set the script to optimize then upload the folder containing the images after. This would avoid uploading the same image multiple times.
